## listisize() function

Builds a speakable and readable list from a set of items.

For example, \["one", "two", "three", "four"\] will be transformed to "one, two, three or four".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function listisize(items: string[], preferredDelimiter?: ListDelimiter): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  items | string\[\] |  |
|  preferredDelimiter | [ListDelimiter](./stentor-utils.listdelimiter.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
